DOC.detailed_description: Through french adaptation `` illness perception questionnaire memory '' , study aim prospectively examine memory problem perception patient memory complaint [ MCs ] accompaniers diagnostic process . The investigator plan recruit 125 patient MCs come first time Research Resources Memory Center Nancy , France . Participants express MCs must free dementia diagnosis first visit . Participants also need accompany accompanier fluent French . This study approve local Ethics Committee ( Committee Protection Persons ) French Health Security Agency . After give informed consent , patient accompaniers follow throughout diagnostic process three visit : first visit , one month first visit , six month diagnosis disclosure .
